serviceProviders.title: IBCLC, Midwife, RN
serviceProviders.bio: Rebecca is an International Board Certified Lactation Consultant (IBCLC) and registered midwife with over 12 years of experience in maternal and newborn care.
serviceProviders.personalStory: As a mother of three myself, I understand the unique challenges and joys of the breastfeeding journey. My passion lies in providing evidence-based, compassionate care to help families achieve their feeding goals.

credentials.title: International Board Certified Lactation Consultant
credentials.issuingBody: International Board of Lactation Consultant Examiners

credentials.title: Registered Midwife
credentials.issuingBody: Nursing and Midwifery Board of Australia

credentials.title: Registered Nurse
credentials.issuingBody: Nursing and Midwifery Board of Australia

serviceProviders.approach: Evidence-based practice combined with compassionate, individualized care. I believe every family's journey is unique, and I'm committed to providing support that aligns with your personal goals and values.

serviceProviders.title: Dr., Obstetrician & Fertility Specialist
serviceProviders.bio: Dr. Justin Tucker is a leading obstetrician and fertility specialist with over 15 years of experience helping families achieve their dreams of parenthood.
serviceProviders.personalStory: My journey in reproductive medicine began with a deep desire to help couples navigate the complex path to parenthood. I'm committed to providing cutting-edge treatments with a personal touch.

credentials.title: Fellow of the Royal Australian and New Zealand College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists
Certificate in Reproductive Endocrinology and Infertility
Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery

serviceProviders.approach: Personalized, evidence-based fertility care with a focus on emotional support throughout the journey. I believe in treating the whole person, not just the condition.

serviceProviders.title: Educational Psychologist, PhD
serviceProviders.bio: Gavin is an Educational Psychologist specializing in child development and learning with a PhD in Educational Psychology.
serviceProviders.personalStory: With over 15 years in educational psychology, I focus on supporting children's developmental milestones and helping parents understand their child's unique learning journey.

credentials.title: Doctor of Philosophy in Educational Psychology

serviceProviders.approach: Evidence-based developmental support focused on understanding each child's unique learning profile and helping families navigate developmental challenges.

serviceCenters.name: Full Circle Midwifery & Lactation
serviceCenters.description: Comprehensive midwifery and lactation support services
serviceCenters.overview: Full Circle Midwifery & Lactation provides holistic care for families throughout the childbearing journey, from preconception through the postpartum period.
serviceCenters.mission: To provide evidence-based, compassionate care that empowers families to achieve their birthing and feeding goals.
serviceCenters.culturalConsiderations: Full Circle Midwifery welcomes families from all cultural backgrounds and provides culturally sensitive care that respects diverse birthing and parenting traditions.
